meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of terrorism.
meanings.sent1: The terroristic group planned to attack innocent civilians.
meanings.sent2: The government took action against the terroristic threats.
meanings.sent3: The terroristic plot was foiled by a clever detective.
meanings.sent4: The impact of their terroristic actions reverberated throughout the community.
meanings.sent5: The terroristic nature of the organization was evident in their ruthless tactics.

meanings.definition: Involving or promoting the use of terror or violence as a means of achieving political goals.
meanings.sent1: The terroristic campaign aimed to instill fear in the population.
meanings.sent2: The rebel group resorted to terroristic methods to gain power.
meanings.sent3: The politician's speech had a hint of terroristic undertones.
meanings.sent4: The consequences of their terroristic strategies were far-reaching.
meanings.sent5: The terroristic agenda of the extremists threatened the stability of the region.
